job description:
Position: Information Systems Data Analyst

Location: Administration Building

Assist in designing, administering, and managing District data resources. Develops data maintenance practices to promote data integrity and efficient utilization of District resources. Uses repeatable practices to ensure data availability, integrity, and security; recovers corrupted data and eliminates data redundancy; leverages database tolls to improve database performance. Provides training and mentorship to other department staff to promote general knowledge of data systems and support.

Qualifications:
  • Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field of study or equivalent knowledge.
  • Minimum 5-years of experience with information system management, analysis, and reporting.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of SQL and database management tools.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of SSRS.
  • Candidates with information system management within an education environment experience preferred.
  • Pennsylvania Educational State/Federal Reporting experience preferred (PIMS).
  • Certification preferred SQL, Cognos.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
  • Valid PA Driver's License.
  • Must successfully complete and maintain compliance with all federal and state background and criminal record check requirements.
  • Candidate must adhere to all local, state, federal, and school code requirements for employment.
Apply Online using Job ID#3042

SDL2017
